channel.title: Growth Hack on Ramium
channel.description: Recent content in Growth Hack on Ramium

item.title: What is a good test for determining NSM?
item.description: In general, we all understand NSM is one metric that the whole organization goes behind. However, when you try to identify such a metric, you will have a hard time. More the stakeholders you involve, more will be the number of goals they would want to achieve, and every such goal will have one or more metrics, considering each of those goals to be important, You will find it even more harded to select a NSM .

item.title: what is NSM? why is it important?
item.description: Most people define North Star metric as the single most important driver of success and it provides an initiative for the whole company to rally behind. Though this is a good definition, it does not explain what it reflects and what it leads to.
